issue.title: SubT CommsClient Can't handle ros namespaces

content.raw:
Your comms client should not connect directly to the broker because the broker uses only Ignition Transport and your client uses only ROS. Your client should be talking to the subt comms relay, which relays information between ROS and Ignition. See: #!/osrf/subt/wiki/cloudsim_architecture.

Are you unable to communicate with the comms relay node?
content.html:
Your comms client should not connect directly to the broker because the broker uses only Ignition Transport and your client uses only ROS. Your client should be talking to the subt comms relay, which relays information between ROS and Ignition. See: #!/osrf/subt/wiki/cloudsim_architecture.

Are you unable to communicate with the comms relay node?
